name: SunShine King
text: While this card is on the field, your opponent cannot target other "SunShine" monsters you control with card effects. You can send this card you control to the GY; shuffle 1 "SunShine" card from your GY into your Deck, then draw 1 card. If this card is sent to the GY by an opponent's card effect: Target 1 "SunShine" card in your GY; if it is a Spell card, activate it, and if it is a monster, Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "SunShine King" once per turn.
